程序包的使用
view

  • 使用view的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    main
    Contains two core classes.
    view
    Contains all classes of graphical interface design.
    view.menuBarItem
    Contains all classes of menu bar.
    view.toolBarButton
    Contains all classes of tool bar.
  • main使用的view中的类 
    类和说明
    ColorLabelTransform
    Facilitate the transformation between color and box label.
    GameController
    Indispensable element in GUI design which takes charge of reception of all input by users.
    GameModel
    A class for modeling the game surface with equal-sized blocks.
  • view使用的view中的类 
    类和说明
    GameController
    Indispensable element in GUI design which takes charge of reception of all input by users.
    GameFrame
    This is the JFrame class for the main game window.
    GameModel
    A class for modeling the game surface with equal-sized blocks.
    GamePanel
    The frame JPanel containing the game.
    GameStatusBar
    The Status Bar of the game frame.
    WindowPanel
    The content pane of the game frame.
  • view.menuBarItem使用的view中的类 
    类和说明
    GameFrame
    This is the JFrame class for the main game window.
  • view.toolBarButton使用的view中的类 
    类和说明
    GameController
    Indispensable element in GUI design which takes charge of reception of all input by users.
    GameFrame
    This is the JFrame class for the main game window.
